profile.descripcion: I'm Mateo Bertello, a fullstack developer with a focus on frontend. I enjoy turning ideas and designs into websites that match the original vision, with clean code and great attention to detail. I like to understand the product, work closely with teams, and bring innovative solutions to the table. I'm self-taught, responsible, and always ready for a new challenge.

projects.title: Futbolar
projects.subtitle: Real Project
projects.description: I developed a real-time forum platform for Argentine soccer fans, with over 200 registered users.
works: Built the frontend using React.js and the backend with Node.js, Express, and Sequelize, using PostgreSQL as the database.
Optimized performance by implementing Redis for session caching and faster request handling.
Integrated Socket.io to enable real-time messaging.
Added Google OAuth for user registration.
Integrated Mercado Pago Checkout Pro to process donations and manage user benefits.
Configured and managed a full VPS setup (frontend, backend, database, and Redis), ensuring security and performance.
Improved SEO and set up analytics tools like Google Analytics and Microsoft Clarity.

projects.title: SOL Kindergarten
projects.subtitle: Real Project
projects.description: Designed and developed an optimized landing page for a kindergarten using Astro.
works: Implemented advanced SEO, focusing on structure, metadata, and loading optimization.
Added tracking tools like Google Analytics and Microsoft Clarity to analyze visitor behavior.

projects.title: MovieApp
projects.subtitle: Practice Project
projects.description: Created a web app with React.js that consumes the TMDb API, allowing users to search for and view up-to-date details on movies and TV shows.
works: Designed the user interface and user experience.
Implemented logic to manage API requests to TMDb.

projects.title: Bookhouse
projects.subtitle: Practice Project
projects.description: Developed a book e-commerce platform, implementing the frontend with React.js.
works: Used Firebase to store and manage the book catalog.
Designed the interface and improved user experience.
Added individual book detail pages with complete information.

projects.title: Sportscenter
projects.subtitle: Practice Project
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce platform for sneakers.
works: Built the frontend using HTML5, Sass, and JavaScript.
Created a product catalog where users can browse available options.

footer.descripcion: Frontend Developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences.
footer.frase: If someone else did it, it means I can do it too. And if no one has done it, then I'll be the first.
